games.name: Adam and Eve Go Xmas
games.description: Adam and Eve GO's new Christmas episode is now available! Help Adam and get into the holiday mood! Have fun!

games.name: Uphill Rush 8
games.description: Uphill Rush 8 is an exciting new installment of the Uphill Rush game series. Choose a float and race down the craziest slides in the waterpark. In this adventure game, you can race up and down the wackiest waterslides on a series of silly floats. Try to keep the float balanced, because a fall from one of these towering tube chutes wonâ€™t end well.

games.name: Fireboy and Watergirl 1 Forest Temple
games.description: Fireboy and Watergirl, made by Oslo Albet, are exploring the Forest Temple in search of diamonds. Switch between Fireboy & Watergirl and play alone or together as 2 players. The goal is to reach the exit safely, so be careful. Fireboy cannot touch water and Watergirl cannot touch fire.

games.name: The Smurfs Ocean Cleanup
games.description: It's time to lend a hand in The Smurfs Ocean Cleanup. Will you be able to collect all the garbage in this Smurfs game?

games.name: Fireboy and Watergirl 3 Ice Temple
games.description: In the third title in the popular Fireboy and Watergirl game series, Fireboy continues to deal with hot things like lava, while friend Watergirl keeps everything cool with her water skills. But their powers will get a little messed up while they're inside a icy and mysterious temple in this Fireboy and Watergirl game!

games.name: My Shark Show
games.description: Immerse yourself in this adventure in My Shark Show! It's time to wow the audience with your tricks and exploits in this shark game!

games.name: Vex 6
games.description: Another series of deadly challenges awaits you in Vex 6. How long can you survive in this fun adventure game?

games.name: Fireboy & Watergirl 6: Fairy Tales
games.description: Another magical adventure is about to begin in Fireboy and Watergirl 6 Fairy Tales! Join the fearless duo on another journey in this online platform game.

games.name: Bridge Legends Online
games.description: It's time to help this adorable couple in meeting at the bridge's end! Their destinies have separated, and they must reunite! Play Bridge Legends Online right now!

games.name: Robot Wars
games.description: Be ready for the most exciting duel type game! Test your offensive ability, painting ability and use your imagination to create! Have fun!

games.name: Jetpack Joyride
games.description:
Bullet-powered jetpacks! Giant mechanical! 

From the makers of Fruit Ninja comes this insane, high flying endless runner that will keep you on the edge of your seat!

It's time to join Barry Steakfries and equip cool jetpacks, suit up in stylish costumes and ride crazy vehicles in his endless running quest to beat the scientists to the end of the lab.

Play now for FREE!

games.name: Square Bird
games.description: Square Bird is a side-scrolling 2D platform game. Your bird will build a tower of square eggs to avoid danger whenever you click. It's a simple and fun game!

games.name: Adam and Eve 8
games.description: Adam finds himself with his head in the clouds! He has no idea where he is or where to find his beloved Eve! Stay out of the hands of another lady who fancies Adam and watch out for dangerous reptiles and dinosaurs! Find a smart safe but way to guide Adam home to his worried wifey throughout many brain-cracking and puzzling levels!

games.name: Adam and Eve Go 2
games.description:
In Adam and Eve GO, despite the dangers and the challenges of the prehistoric times, love found a way to blossom! Adam loves Eve and he'll do anything to make her happy. Join this adventurous caveman through the multiple fun and challenging levels of this game! Can you help him overcome the obstacles and bring a nice flower to his significant other?

Dinosaurs, traps, and many other dangers are waiting for you in this addictive game! Your objective is to complete each level by collecting a rose

games.name: Bob The Robber
games.description: Steal treasures, avoid cameras and take out guards in Bob The Robber 1, a fun stealth puzzle platform game! Bob knew his destiny from a young age. He trained hard for years to learn his trade. After years of practice Bob decided to sneak into the casino and steal the treasures!

games.name: Bob The Robber 2
games.description: Bob The Robber has to protect the city! This bandit is the only one that can save the day. In Bob The Robber 2 you have to sneak into buildings, avoid cameras, pick locks, take out guards and watch out for Zombies!

games.name: Bob the Robber 3
games.description: Bob The Robber 3 is a free action game from Kizi Games, loved by millions all over the world. Bob joins the good guys to fight against an international conspiracy. Only you can help him!

games.name: Dynamons World
games.description: Travel the World map and defeat and cath Dynamons! Train them and level them up in battle!

games.name: Fireboy and Watergirl 2 Light Temple
games.description: This time, Fireboy and Watergirl (made by Oslo Albet), are exploring the Light Temple. Use the temple light to reach the exit safely. Switch between Fireboy & Watergirl, but be careful, Fireboy cannot touch water and Watergirl cannot touch fire.

games.name: Fireboy and Watergirl 4 Crystal Temple
games.description: Fireboy and Watergirl (by Oslo Albet) on an adventure through the Crystal Temple! Teleport from one side to the other. Complete all challenging levels. Watch out for all dangers and observe the colors of the teleporters. Switch between Fireboy & Watergirl- but watch out; Fireboy cannot touch water, and Watergirl cannot touch fire.

games.name: Fireboy and Watergirl 5 Elements
games.description: Explore the Elemental Temples in Fireboy and Watergirl 5 (by Oslo Albet)! Solve many puzzles, collect all the diamonds and beat the time. Fireboy and Watergirl Elements is a completely new game with lots of new elements. Travel to all temples in the Fireboy Watergirl series. Enter the new Fire Temple, The Forest Temple, The Ice Temple, The Light Temple, The Wind Temple and The Crystal Temple. In FBWG5 you can play the adventure alone or with a friend. Reach the exit safely.

games.name: Gold Strike
games.description: Throw the pickaxe and go for the gold strike. If the wall gets too close, you will get stuck in the gold mine!

games.name: Grindcraft Remastered
games.description: GRINDCRAFT remastered is a new version to Grindcraft. You must grind your way through items and worlds inspired by Minecraft. You must mine various resources from the overworld, harvest and gather ripe crops from the field and fight mobs for various other items. GRIND CRAFTS gameplay is very similar to a cookie clicker game.

games.name: Idle Arks: Sail and Build
games.description: Feel the salty tidal breeze in Idle Arks Sail and Build! Help Adam and his friends in this ocean survival game.

games.name: Love Balls
games.description: Do you know the hottest game Love Balls? You can play this online version. If you are good at drawing and solve logic puzzles, try it now. It's time to find a way to make the love balls get together. The two balls will drop from different locations in each level. Simple rules but hard to complete in a short time. Create the highest score and play with your friends. Have fun.

games.name: Money Movers 1
games.description: These two criminals need your help to escape this heavily guard prison. Steal as much money as you can and don't get caught by the security. Good luck playing Money Movers !

games.name: Money Movers 2
games.description: The Money Movers brothers received a letter from their father to help him escape from the prison. In Money Movers 2 you must revisit the prison to help your father escape. Good luck!

games.name: Money Movers 3
games.description: In Money Movers 3 you play as the guard and his loyal dog companion. Capture thiefs inside the prison and switch between the two characters. Have fun!

games.name: Pet Runner
games.description: Run to chase after the robber and explore the endless running worlds of Talking Tom Gold Run!

games.name: Space Rush
games.description: Play Space Rush now on kiz10.com !!! A new game comes to the best style and with the characters of Among Us run and do not stop running through the dangerous platforms of the different levels of the game, be very careful because you could fall off the cliff or collide with different obstacles such as bombs, objects that will block your way. Have fun with this new addictive entertaining game exclusive to kiz10.com !! remember that we have exclusive games every week and new games for free every da

games.name: Super Oscar
games.description:
Super Oscar is the greatest platform adventure for your web browsers! Everything has been carefully designed for you to have a lot of fun! We warn you, itÂ´s not an easy game so good luck!

The game includes:
- 6 beautiful worlds(more coming soon)
- 35 awesome levels(more coming soon)
- 50+ different enemies
- 4 different characters
- 6 different costumes
- 8 different bullets
- Upgradable characters
- And a lot more features!

Super Oscar has now found some costumes to make his adventures a lot

games.name: Vex 3
games.description: Prepare yourself for one of the most difficult adventures of your life! The Vex series continues to stare down danger with its action-packed gameplay and many levels filled with devilish traps! In Vex 3, the stick man returns and is ready to conquer the world. Start by stretching your muscles, because youll be running, jumping, climbing, swimming, and rolling! Lasers, spikes, and many other deadly obstacles await you! Can you dodge them all?

games.name: Vex 5
games.description: An all new Vex installment, finally version 5 is there for you to play! With new levels, achievements and traps to explore, you're bound to get vexed!

body.name: Sand Sort Puzzle
body.description: You must tap on the glasses to pour the same-colored sand into separate glasses and sort them in Sand Sort Puzzle. A flower will grow on a glass if you fill it with one hue. Have fun!

body.name: Microsoft Sudoku
body.description: It's time to work with some numbers! How fast can you complete these puzzles in Microsoft Sudoku?

body.name: Amazing Sudoku
body.description: Discover Amazing Sudoku! Can you put all the numbers in the right places?

body.name: Shapes Sudoku
body.description: Now is the time to play a classic game! This time it's all about the shapes! Look for the shapes that aren't there! Let's see if you're up for the challenge or not! Have fun!

body.name: Sudoku Classic
body.description: It's time to play some of your old favorites again! Are you feeling bored at home? Do you ever feel as if you're doing the same things over and over? So, that's all there is to it! Play Sudoku Classic right now!

body.name: Love Pins
body.description: This should be a happy day because this couple of lovers will have a date. But there is a problem now, so many roadblocks on their road. Use the tools to kill bad guys and help them to meet their lover. Use your brain to solve these problems. Can you help them to meet each other? Have a try in the Love Pins!

body.name: Sudoku Village
body.description: Do you want to relax with a relaxing puzzle? Play the Sudoku Village game to improve your logical reasoning skills. Relaxing music will help you unwind, while high-quality images will motivate you to concentrate more! Have fun!

body.name: Mahjong Shanghai Dynasty
body.description: Enjoy a classic mahjong game with a Shanghai Dynasty theme. Connect pairs and clear the board.

body.name: KrisMas Mahjong
body.description:
Krismas Mahjong is a Christmas Version of Kris Mahjong. A very popular Mahjong game. 
Connect the mahjong pieces in KrisMas Mahjong. Clear the board by removing all pairs of identical tiles

body.name: Mahjong Link
body.description: In Mahjong Link you must match two identical Mahjong blocks. A block has to be free on at least one side. It's a very relaxing and simple game to play. Each mahjong tile in this link game is numbered to identify the tiles more easily.

body.name: Microsoft Mahjong
body.description: Microsoft Mahjong is the classic tile-matching game now updated with Daily Challenges, a new look and feel, and over 40 puzzles! Enjoy gorgeous graphics and relaxing sounds with multiple visual themes to choose from.

shortDesc.en: Microsoft Mahjong is the classic tile-matching game now updated with Daily Challenges, a new look and feel, and over 40 puzzles!
shortDesc.no: Microsoft Mahjong er en nyere versjon av det klassiske brettspillet som inkluderer daglige utfordringer, et helt nytt utseende, og over 40 puslespill!

body.name: Impostor
body.description: A spaceship is travelling in endless space, and its crew is trying to survive. There is an impostor among them and they need to stay on guard. They need to be aware of empty rooms, and be ready for an attack when left alone with someone else, what if that someone is the impostor.
